title: Four more days
creator_credit: George Pashuk and University of New South Wales. Tertiary Education Research Centre
brief_description: Experimental study of three different prison environments. The central question raised is: ”What sorts of changes are required in prisons in order to produce a system of human relationships consistent with a correctional rather than a custodial orientation?”
